nodes.text: Windredd was a Human male who served as a loyal bodyguard to Renata Alde during the Cold War. While protecting Renata, he engaged a Sith Warrior and was quickly defeated.
Windredd is a non-player character from the massively multi-player online role playing video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, which was released by BioWare in 2011. He is voiced by Brian Bloom.
